title: Locked out of client
body: My friends and i are all locked out of logging in and/or are experiencing difficulties and errors in-client. help pls

replies.body:
Hey, the servers where having tech difficulties to the point users where unable to login or connect to the servers for a period of time.

Instead of posting in the future you can find information about server status over at http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce which will give you a run down of any problems the server may  be experiencing
